text:
Farzaneh Taidi (‎; 1945 – 25 March 2020) was an Iranian actress. She was born in Tehran. She appeared in a number of Persian language movies starting in the 1970s. Her movie credits include "Hell + Me", "The Eighth Day of the Week" and "The Journey of the Stone". She also appeared in "Not Without My Daughter" (1991).
On 25 March 2020, Taidi died in London, United Kingdom of cancer. She was 74 or 75.
